name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: League of Legends Xayah Live Wallpaper

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Xayah live wallpaper with soothing rain and captivating burgundy tones.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Immerse yourself in the enchanting world of Xayah with this stunning live wallpaper extension!

🎨 Minimalist Design: A captivating interface featuring a rainy backdrop and rich burgundy tones that echo Xayah’s enigmatic allure.
⏰ Clock and Date: Stay updated with a display that complements Xayah’s elegance and tactical brilliance.
🔗 Quick Access Shortcuts: Effortlessly navigate to your favorite websites.
🎮 Play Games: Explore League of Legends-inspired mini-games directly from your shortcut panel.
🔍 Search Bar: Perform fast and efficient searches with your preferred engine.
🚀 More Extensions: Enhance your browsing experience with features as unique and impactful as Xayah’s abilities.
